verses.verse: And there happened<WH7122> to be there a man<WH376> of Belial<WH1100>, whose name<WH8034> was Sheba<WH7652>, the son<WH1121> of Bichri<WH1075>, a Benjamite<WH1145>: and he blew<WH8628> a trumpet<WH7782>, and said<WH559>, We have no part<WH2506> in David<WH1732>, neither have we inheritance<WH5159> in the son<WH1121> of Jesse<WH3448>: every<WH376> man<WH376> to his tents<WH168>, O Israel<WH3478>.
